dmca.title: Invalid use of copyrighted material
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Dan Gaul [mailto:dan@digitaltrends.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2007 5:01 PM
To: zzzzzz
Cc: adsense-abuse@google.com; abuse@google.com
Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3378344F] FW: Invalid use of copyrighted
material

I'll re-iterate my case to your department.

My name is Dan Gaul.  I'm co-owner of Designtechnica Corporation, which
owns
Digitaltrends.com.

We are a customer of EV1 (rs-120096-2) and a previous customer of The
Planet
before moving to EV1.

A current customer of The Planet has a website which has multiple
copyrighted material of Digital Trends (in fact all of their content is
ripped off from other sites) on their site without permission or
recognition
to the original copyright holder, Digital Trends.

The link to some of the offending pages are:
http://www.gadgetinsight.com/2006/11/04/Gateway-NX100X.html
http://www.gadgetinsight.com/2007/03/01/Toshiba-HD-XA2.html

Our original stories:
http://reviews.digitaltrends.com/review3753.html
http://reviews.digitaltrends.com/review4383.html

They also claim copyright on the material based on the footer.

Looking at their other stories, it seems all their content is ripped of
and
used to generate money from Google AdSense.  For example:
http://www.gadgetinsight.com/2007/03/03/Wolverine-PMP.html
Compared to:
http://www.turbogadgets.com/2007/03/02/wolverine-pmp-huge-160gb-hdd/

http://www.gadgetinsight.com/2007/03/07/ThermoHAWK-200-Touchless-Thermom
eter
.html
Compared to
http://www.i4u.com/article8140.html

http://www.gadgetinsight.com/bloger/Blogging-Maria.html?page=1
Compared to:
http://www.coolest-gadgets.com/20070301/eco-kettle-multi-chamber-kettle-
save
s-money/

I've CC'd Google AdSense's abuse department and abuse@google.com

I appreciate your cooperation.

-dan

-- 
Dan Gaul
Digital Trends
dan@digitaltrends.com
http://www.digitaltrends.com/
503.342.2890 ext. 83

------ Forwarded Message
From: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Wed, 7 Mar 2007 14:19:43 +0000
To: <dan@digitaltrends.com>
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3378344F] FW: Invalid use of copyrighted
material

Reference: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3378344F]

copyright@theplanet.com is the clearinghouse for all copyright
infringement
reports. Your email is being sent to our legal counsel at the address
copyright@theplanet.com for consideration. You may find their direct
contact
information at this URL:
http://www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal.asp

--
Regards,
Abuse Department
The Planet
abuse@theplanet.com
http://www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal.asp

STATES

X-Note: User Rule Hits:

MIME element (text/plain)
I'm forwarding this email we sent to the WHOIS email for the domain
gadgetinsight.com 
 
They are using copyrighted text and images without permission or without
recognition. 
 
From the WHOIS records, The Planet is the HOST for the IP.
We are an EV1/The Planet customer (RS-120096-2). We were with The Planet
before switching to EV1 for about 4 years.  I'd appreciate if you can
help
us expedite our message to the owner of the site.
 
 
Thanks, 
-dan 
--  
Dan Gaul 
Digital Trends 
dan@digitaltrends.com
http://www.digitaltrends.com/
503.342.2890 ext. 83
 
------ Forwarded Message
From: Dan Gaul <dan@digitaltrends.com>
Date: Wed, 07 Mar 2007 12:00:42 -0800
To: <info@flashedcoder.com>
Conversation: Invalid use of copyrighted material
Subject: Invalid use of copyrighted material
 
We have noticed on the site gadgetinsight.com our copyright work is
copied
and presented with acknowledgement to us and without a linkback.
 
While we are flattered that you fell our content is compelling enough to
display on our site, we require full recognition and a linkback to the
full
article on Digital Trends.
 
The offending article on gadgetinsight is:
http://www.gadgetinsight.com/2006/11/04/Gateway-NX100X.html
 
The article you copied is:
http://reviews.digitaltrends.com/review3753_main18773.html
 
Please promptly give credit to Digital Trends and a linkback to the full
article, which is typical procedure with a blog, or remove the content.
 
Thank you 
-dan 
--  
Dan Gaul 
Digital Trends 
dan@digitaltrends.com
http://www.digitaltrends.com/
503.342.2890 ext. 83
 
------ End of Forwarded Message
 
 




------ End of Forwarded Message
